data.oai_dc:dc: Files: figure2.zip (contains files well.XXX (XXX are numbers from 079 to 108 and from 301 to 396))Format: ZIP archive (contains flow cytometry data files FCS 2.0)Contents: Flow cytometry analyses of bacterial cultures. Samples were excited at a wavelength of 488 nm, while emission was detected at 510 nm (GFP) and 560 nm (DsRed).
